text:
Plumb Island: A set of three views from Emmons Ave., at Knapp Street, and taken at different angles. Views one and two show the remains of shacks that once stood on the Island. In their background is the Marine Parkway Bridge. View No. three is taken in a northeastly direction and shows shacks still standing on the north side of the Island.
April 29, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Islands - Plumb Island - Emmons Avenue - Knapp Street - Brooklyn.
